general.description: Does your work require you to venture into dangerous territory? Are you facing opposition your shields can't handle? The Milspec U-9 "Magus" jammer is what you need! Throw the bloodhounds off your scent with the press of a button. While your enemies are still trying to make sense out of the garbage they're getting on their sensors, you will have already made your escape! Fly safe, fly Milspec.
